stories.text:
I'm curious of the veracity of this comment: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31291549

It describes a "Project Periwinkle" that essentially would be spinning down Heroku. Is this really happening?

Is it time for me to look for a different host?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is Heroku Being Sunset?

stories.text:
Hey HN,

I've recently released the MVP version of Rebudget, a personal finance app that I've been working on-and-off over the last 2 years. Rebudget helps you create a budget and track your personal finances using the zero-based budgeting or the envelope method. I originally started working on this mostly as a fun side project to experiment and see what I could do, but also as a potential Mint/YNAB replacement for myself (as well as my wife's spreadsheet!).

There is still a lot of work to be done (it may be a little rough around the edges in some places), but I'm excited about the challenges and work ahead.

I'm open to any questions or feedback that is provided. Thanks!
stories.title: Show HN: Rebudget, Simplify Your Budget
